entry.data:
SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 60
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
MUCH COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN AFTER MIDNIGHT
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

RAIN
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
RAIN LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
TEMPERATURE FALLING INTO THE UPPER 40S IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT
